name: GetFileManagerFiles
description:
Retrieve images and files from the Mailchimp File Manager.

Use this tool to get a list of all images and files stored in the File Manager of the Mailchimp account. It provides access to media assets used in marketing campaigns.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Use dot notation for sub-object parameters.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields_list
parameters.description: Comma-separated fields to omit from the response. Use dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: number_of_records_to_return
parameters.description: Specifies the number of records to return. Default is 10; maximum is 1000.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip for pagination. Default is 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: file_type
parameters.description: The file type to filter File Manager files. Expected as a string value.

value_schema.description: The file type for the File Manager file.

parameters.name: file_created_by_user
parameters.description: The Mailchimp account user who created the File Manager file.

value_schema.description: The Mailchimp account user who created the File Manager file.

parameters.name: restrict_files_before_date
parameters.description: Restrict the response to files created before the specified ISO 8601 date.

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to files created before the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: created_after_date
parameters.description: Files created after this date will be included in the response. Use ISO 8601 format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to files created after the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: file_sort_field
parameters.description: Specify the field to sort the files by, such as 'name', 'date', etc.

value_schema.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

parameters.name: sort_order_direction
parameters.description: Sets the order direction for sorting results. Use 'ASC' for ascending and 'DESC' for descending.

value_schema.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

value_schema.description: The Mailchimp account user who created the File Manager file.

parameters.name: before_created_at
parameters.description: Restrict the response to files created before the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to files created before the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.name: since_created_at
parameters.description: Restrict the response to files created after the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

value_schema.description: Restrict the response to files created after the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

parameters.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.
